BaseTemplate.description: Starter code for your Nextjs Boilerplate with Tailwind CSS

Index.meta_description: Zero Sugar is an interactive health app that helps teens and parents monitor daily sugar, salt, and fat intake. With features like an analytics dashboard, healthy lifestyle guidance, and a sugar label scanner, Zero Sugar supports healthier, more enjoyable eating habits.

CounterForm.presentation: The counter is stored in the database and incremented by the value you provide.

About.about_paragraph: Welcome to our About page! We are a team of passionate individuals dedicated to creating amazing software.

Portfolio.presentation: Welcome to my portfolio page! Here you will find a carefully curated collection of my work and accomplishments. Through this portfolio, I'm to showcase my expertise, creativity, and the value I can bring to your projects.

PortfolioSlug.content: Created a set of promotional materials and branding elements for a corporate event. Crafted a visually unified theme, encompassing a logo, posters, banners, and digital assets. Integrated the client's brand identity while infusing it with a contemporary and innovative approach. Garnered favorable responses from event attendees, resulting in a successful event with heightened participant engagement and increased brand visibility.

SignIn.meta_description: Seamlessly sign in to your account with our user-friendly login process.

SignUp.meta_description: Effortlessly create an account through our intuitive sign-up process.

LandingPage.title: Zero Sugar
LandingPage.description: Interactive web app for monitoring daily sugar intake and promoting a healthier lifestyle.

features.ctaDescription: Join Zero Sugar to build a balanced, healthier eating habit. Sign up now and transform your diet!

LandingPage.footer: Â© 2024 Zero Sugar Web App. All rights reserved.

recommendation.reduceSugar: Consider reducing your sugar intake by 10% this week.
recommendation.increaseWater: Try to increase your water intake to 8 glasses a day.

trend.increasedSalt: Your salt consumption has increased by 15% compared to last month.
trend.decreasedFat: Great job! Your fat intake has decreased by 5% this month.

tips.useNaturalSweeteners: Opt for natural sweeteners and whole fruits instead of processed sugars.
tips.useHerbs: Look for low-sodium alternatives and use herbs for flavoring instead of salt.
tips.unsaturatedFats: Focus on unsaturated fats from sources like avocados, nuts, and olive oil.
